summary: A small set of HD modders' resources converted just for you.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://s14.postimg.org/q6pcedln5/sakyamuni2.png[/img]


This is a small set - almost 50 textured meshes - of resources I've converted in the last few months for my mod "[u][font=Georgia][i][b]Abandoned Temple[/b][/i][/font][/u]" (search it on Google).
Some come from The Witcher 2, other from the expansion "Blood and Wine" of The Witcher 3 and some other come from free 3D HD scans available online.
You can find statues, furniture (without markers), various clutter and a small set of ruins.
These resources are free to use, just remember to credit me.


Special thanks to [b][i][size=2]CD PROJEKT RED[/size][/i][/b], to let us convert their assets.
author: LorSakyamuni
